altTitles.zh: 前女友成了我的顶头上司

description.en:
Yue Chu Ran x Ji Yu

Ji Yu is a soft-spoken worker, the type to get scolded by the boss on the daily. As luck would have it, the department sees the addition of a returning manager from an overseas branch, rumor has it that she's a charming and approachable beauty who goes out of her way to care for her subordinates. But she'd never expect to find that the new manager is her ex-girlfriend, with whom she has a grudge!

When Ji Yu was young and reckless, she had her sights instantly set on a junior sister. That junior sister had long hair and smelled nice, she just stuttered a bit and was a bit timid. Ji Yu had forced that junior to kiss with her every day, without care for the other party's consent or if the feeling was mutual. Eventually, Ji Yu had forced Yue Chu Ran to date her. As graduation approached, her conscience kicked in, and she decided to give the junior a way out. With great resolve, she wrote a passionate breakup letter, cut of all methods of contact and disappeared without a trace.

Who would dare believe that Ji Yu's direct superior would have been the victim of her forced affections? In response to Ji Yu's draft proposal, Yue Chu Ran replied: "Redo it. The logic is unclear." Ji Yu exchanged a glance with someone else, but Yue Chu Ran remarked: "If you're flirting during work hours, I can fire you." Gradually, their conversation had taken a strange turn. "Give me a kiss and I'll write it for you." Yue Chu Ran's expression remained unchanged. "Hold my hand for an hour and you have tomorrow off." "Come home with me... and I'll grant any of your requests."
description.zh: 乐初然X季渔 　　季渔，一个低声下气的打工人，每天被上司骂的那种。 　　时来运转，部门来了一个海外归来的新上司，听闻是个好相处的大美人，对下属格外照顾。 　　但没想到这个新上司，居然有仇的前女友！ 　　* 　　季渔年少轻狂不懂事，一眼就瞧中了一个小学妹。 　　小学妹头发长长身上香香，就是有点结巴和胆小。 　　季渔每天强迫小学妹和自己亲亲，哪怕对方不愿意，也要亲亲抱抱。 　　到后来，季渔甚至强迫乐初然和自己谈起了恋爱。 　　临近毕业时她良心发现，决定放小学妹一条生路，慷慨激昂写下分手书，删除了联系方式，直接远走高飞了。 　　* 　　季渔的顶头上司是被她强制爱的受害者，说出去谁敢信？ 　　季渔写策划，乐初然说："逻辑不清，重写。"　 　　季渔和别人对视一眼，乐初然说："工作时间谈恋爱，我可以辞退你。" 　　渐渐的，他们的对话奇怪了起来。 　　"亲我一下，我替你写，"乐初然面色不改，"牵手一小时明天放假。" '和我回家……随你提要求。"
